author: Staff Reporter
text: The International Society for Krishna Consciousness (ISKCON) is celebrating the Gaura Purnima, the auspicious appearance day of Sri Chaitanya Mahaprabhu, an incarnation of Lord Sri Krishna, on March 23 on its premises in Karuppur. The celebrations will begin with bhajans at 6 p.m. Special arrangements have been made by the temple management for the benefit of the devotees. For details, contact: 0427-2001686 or 98425-71797.
title: Gaura Purnima
